title: Bug 6410 - File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
description: When using code assist, the file is being marked as dirty even though no changes have been made.
OB: When using code assist, the file is being marked as dirty.
EB: If code assist has nothing to suggest, it should not mark the file as dirty.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the file in the code editor. 
2. Trigger the code assist feature. 
3. Verify if the file is marked as dirty without any changes being made.
